ddi:var.name: CASE_ID
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Unique respondent identifier

ddi:var.name: GPS_NAC_ADOPTER
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Which survey was completed

ddi:var.name: SURVEY_SOURCE
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Which Survey R Completed

ddi:var.name: STATE
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Which state do you live in?

ddi:var.name: HOME
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What type of home do you live in?

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Apartment\Condo in a house or a building with 2-4 units
Apartment\Condo in a building with 5 or more units

ddi:var.name: HAVESOLAR
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Do you have solar panels that generate electricity at your home?

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Have solar panels installed, but they aren't working now
Had solar panels on a past home, but have moved
Have signed a contract for solar panels, but don't have working panels yet

ddi:var.name: PROMPT1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Saw advertising or news article

ddi:var.name: PROMPT2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Planning\doing other work on your home

ddi:var.name: PROMPT3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Looking for ways to reduce energy bills

ddi:var.name: PROMPT4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Planning for retirement

ddi:var.name: PROMPT5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Considering\adding a major new energy use

ddi:var.name: PROMPT6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Had group purchase opportunity

ddi:var.name: PROMPT7
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Came into some money

ddi:var.name: PROMPT8
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Heard about low-money-down options

ddi:var.name: PROMPT9
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Saw solar on a home or being installed

ddi:var.name: PROMPT10
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Someone you know talked to you about it

ddi:var.name: PROMPT11
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Offered at a retail store, home show, or community event

ddi:var.name: PROMPT12
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Heard it was more affordable

ddi:var.name: PROMPT13
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Bought a home\moved

ddi:var.name: PROMPT14
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Approached by an installer

ddi:var.name: PROMPT15
ddi:var.ddi:labl: What prompted you - Don't know

ddi:var.name: PROMPT_HOME1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Prompted by work on your home - Roof repair or replacement

ddi:var.name: PROMPT_HOME2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Prompted by work on your home - Remodel or addition

ddi:var.name: PROMPT_HOME3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Prompted by work on your home - Appliance or equipment replacement

ddi:var.name: PROMPT_HOME4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Prompted by work on your home - Energy improvement

ddi:var.name: PROMPT_HOME5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Prompted by work on your home - Something else

ddi:var.name: INSTALL_YR_BINNED
ddi:var.ddi:labl: When panels started producing electricity : Year

ddi:var.name: TIME_AtoB_FRAME
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Time from [A] first talking to an installer to [B] signing a contract? TIME FRAME

ddi:var.name: TIME_AtoB_NUM_TEXT_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Time from [A] first talking to an installer to [B] signing a contract? SPECIFY NUMBER

ddi:var.name: TIME_BtoC_FRAME
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Time from [B] contract to [C] generating electricity? TIME FRAME

ddi:var.name: TIME_BtoC_NUM_TEXT_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Time from [B] contract to [C] generating electricity? SPECIFY NUMBER

ddi:var.name: TIME_CONSIDERED
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How long considered before first talking to an installer

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all - talking to the solar installer got you interested

ddi:var.name: INST_TALKEDTO
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How many companies talked to about installing solar

ddi:var.name: INST_QOTE_BUY_TEXT_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How many installers quoted buying panels

ddi:var.name: INST_QOTE_LSE_TEXT_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How many installers quoted leasing panels

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Lowering your total electricity costs

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Getting a good return on your investment

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Adding to your home’s market value

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Protection from rising electricity prices in the future

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Being able to use renewable energy

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Being able to use a promising new technology

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE7
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Reducing your environmental impact

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE8
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Setting a positive example for others in your community

ddi:var.name: MOTIVE9
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Importance while considering - Making your home more attractive

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_FIRST
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I was one of the first people in my town or city to install solar panels.

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_SAW
ddi:var.ddi:labl: While considering solar, I frequently saw solar installations on other people's homes.

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_PPLTALK
ddi:var.ddi:labl: While considering solar, I frequently heard people I know talking about solar panels.

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_ADS
ddi:var.ddi:labl: While considering solar, I frequently heard about solar panels through advertising or in the news.

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTHKNEW
ddi:var.ddi:labl: While considering solar, did you personally know other people with solar panels?

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTHKNEW_NUM
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Other people with solar panels R knew while considering

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_MULT1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Others R knew with solar while considering - Knowing them made you more inclined to get solar panels

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_MULT2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Others R knew with solar while considering - Knowing them made you less inclined to get solar panels

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_MULT3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Others R knew with solar while considering - They are your close friends or family

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_MULT4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Others R knew with solar while considering - They lived in your same town or city

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_MULT5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Others R knew with solar while considering - You spoke with them about the benefits and costs of solar

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_MULT6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Others R knew with solar while considering - They were important to your own decision to get solar panels

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_MULT7
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Others R knew with solar while considering - They knew one another personally

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_ONE1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: One other R knew with solar while considering - Knowing them made you more inclined to get solar panels

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_ONE2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: One other R knew with solar while considering - Knowing them made you less inclined to get solar panels

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_ONE3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: One other R knew with solar while considering - They are your close friend or family

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_ONE4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: One other R knew with solar while considering - They lived in your same town or city

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_ONE5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: One other R knew with solar while considering - You spoke with them about the benefits and costs of solar

ddi:var.name: INFLNC_OTH_ONE6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: One other R knew with solar while considering - They were important to your own decision to get solar panels

ddi:var.name: DIFFICULTY1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Difficulty - Coming up with the money to get solar

ddi:var.name: DIFFICULTY2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Difficulty - Not everyone in your household being convinced

ddi:var.name: DIFFICULTY3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Difficulty - Finding a trustworthy and competent installer

ddi:var.name: DIFFICULTY4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Difficulty - Finding an installer who would agree to do the work

ddi:var.name: DIFFICULTY5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Difficulty - Permitting, zoning, or neighborhood restrictions

ddi:var.name: DIFFICULTY6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Difficulty - Suitability of your home site (shading, orientation, roof structure or condition)

ddi:var.name: CONCERN1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - Affordability

ddi:var.name: CONCERN2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - Whether solar was a good financial decision

ddi:var.name: CONCERN3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - Whether solar panels offered enough bang for the buck

ddi:var.name: CONCERN4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - Taking on debt or signing a lease

ddi:var.name: CONCERN5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - Equipment quality and reliability over time

ddi:var.name: CONCERN6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - Having to perform regular maintenance on the solar panel system

ddi:var.name: CONCERN7
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - Risk of damaging your roof

ddi:var.name: CONCERN8
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - That solar panels might detract from your home’s “curb appeal”

ddi:var.name: CONCERN9
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Concern - That it might be harder to sell your home with solar panels

ddi:var.name: NPS_PANELS
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How likely are you to recommend solar panels to a friend or neighbor?

ddi:var.name: NPS_INSTALLER
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How likely are you to recommend your solar installer to a friend or neighbor?

ddi:var.name: EXPERIENCE1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: The installation of the panels went smoothly.

ddi:var.name: EXPERIENCE2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Once the contract was signed, the installation of the panels was prompt.

ddi:var.name: EXPERIENCE3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Maintenance of the solar panels has been minimal.

ddi:var.name: EXPERIENCE4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I like the way the solar panels look.

ddi:var.name: EXPERIENCE5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Others have complimented the way the solar panels look.

ddi:var.name: EXPERIENCE6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I haven't had problems with my roof since installation.

ddi:var.name: REGRETS
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Do you have any regrets about buying or leasing solar panels?

ddi:var.name: TOLD_OTHERS
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Since your panels were installed, have you talked to other people about solar panels?

ddi:var.name: TOLD_OTHERS_NUM
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How many people have you talked to? Your best guess is fine.

ddi:var.name: TOLD_OTHERS_LOCAL
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Of those people, about how many live in your town or city?

ddi:var.name: ACTIVITY1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Activities - Write an online review to share on a website like Yelp or Angie's List

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Have Not Done, Would Not Consider

ddi:var.name: ACTIVITY2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Activities - Talk about your solar panels through a social networking site (Facebook, Twitter)

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Have Not Done, Would Not Consider

ddi:var.name: ACTIVITY3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Activities - Post to an online forum about solar

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Have Not Done, Would Not Consider

ddi:var.name: ACTIVITY4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Activities - Provide a customer testimonial for your installer's marketing materials

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Have Not Done, Would Not Consider

ddi:var.name: ACTIVITY5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Activities - Host a solar party at your home for others to learn about solar panels

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Have Not Done, Would Not Consider

ddi:var.name: REFERRAL_NUM
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How many people R has referred to installer

ddi:var.name: REFERRAL_WHEN1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: When R referred others - Before your panels were installed

ddi:var.name: REFERRAL_WHEN2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: When R referred others - Within 3 months after installation

ddi:var.name: REFERRAL_WHEN3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: When R referred others - 4 months to a year after installation

ddi:var.name: REFERRAL_WHEN4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: When R referred others - More than a year after installation

ddi:var.name: SIZE_PANELS_BINNED
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Size of system? Number of Panels

ddi:var.name: SIZE_KW_BINNED
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Size of system? Kilowatts (kW)

ddi:var.name: BUY_LEASE
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Did you buy or lease the solar panels for your home?

ddi:var.name: LOAN
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Did you take out a loan to help pay for your system?

ddi:var.name: OPTION_TO_LEASE
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Even though you purchased your solar panels, did you also have the option to lease them?

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: No, leasing wasn't available or wasn't offered by the installer(s)

ddi:var.name: WHY_BUY1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Buy Considerations - Installer suggested buying over leasing

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_BUY2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Buy Considerations - Buying seemed easier than leasing

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_BUY3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Buy Considerations - Buying would save you more money than leasing

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_BUY4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Buy Considerations - Concerns about signing a long-term lease contract

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_BUY5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Buy Considerations - Buying gives you control over the solar panels

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_BUY6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Buy Considerations - Most of the people you knew bought

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_BUY7
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Buy Considerations - Buying solar panels makes it easier to sell your house

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: LEASE_TYPE
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How is your lease structured?

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Pay monthly to lease solar equipment
Purchase the solar electricity (cents\kWh) generated by the system each month

ddi:var.name: OPTION_TO_BUY
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Even though you leased your solar panels, did you also have the option to buy them?

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: No, buying wasn't available or wasn't offered by the installer(s)
Yes, installer offered the option to buy

ddi:var.name: WHY_LEASE1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Lease Considerations - Didn’t have the funds on hand to purchase the solar panels

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_LEASE2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Lease Considerations - Installer suggested leasing over buying

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.ddi:labl: Lease Considerations - Leasing seemed easier than buying

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_LEASE4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Lease Considerations - Leasing would save you more money than buying

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_LEASE5
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Lease Considerations - The solar company being responsible for maintaining the system and guaranteeing performance

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_LEASE6
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Lease Considerations - Most of the people you knew had leased

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: WHY_LEASE7
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Lease Considerations - Leasing solar panels makes it easier to sell your house

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Not at all important\ Not Applicable

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Economic evaluation method used

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Monthly or annual electric bill savings
Payback time - the time it would take to recover your investment
No, did not evaluate in detail

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_SVG_PERIOD
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Economic evaluation based on electric bill savings - savings period chosen

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_SVGS_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Economic evaluation based on electric bill savings - estimated savings per period - TEXT

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_SVGS_ACTUAL
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Actual electric bill savings so far compared to estimated

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Saving a lot more than expected
Saving a lot less than expected

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_PYBK
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Economic evaluation based on payback time - response given

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_PYBK_YRS_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Economic evaluation based on payback years - TEXT

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_PYBK_ACTUAL
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Actual payback time so far compared to estimated

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Paying back a lot faster than expected
Paying back somewhat faster than expected
Paying back somewhat slower than expected
Paying back a lot slower than expected

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_ROR
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Economic evaluation based on annual rate of return - response given

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_ROR_PCT_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Economic evaluation based on annual rate of return percent per year -TEXT

ddi:var.name: ECONEVAL_ROR_ACTUAL
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Actual annual rate of return so far compared to estimated

ddi:catgry.ddi:labl: Getting a lot higher return than expected
Getting somewhat higher return than expected
Getting somewhat lower return than expected
Getting a lot lower return than expected

ddi:var.name: WINTER_NOPV_BINNED
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How much do you spend (or if R has panels now, did you spend prior to getting panels) on electricity in a typical winter month?

ddi:var.name: WINTER_PV_BINNED
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How much do you spend with solar panels on electricity in a typical winter month?

ddi:var.name: SUMMER_NOPV_BINNED
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How much do you spend (or if R has panels now, did you spend prior to getting panels) on electricity in a typical summer month?

ddi:var.name: SUMMER_PV_BINNED
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How much do you spend with solar panels on electricity in a typical summer month?

ddi:var.name: PN1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I feel a personal obligation to do my part to move the country to a renewable energy future.

ddi:var.name: PN2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I feel a personal obligation to do my part to prevent climate change.

ddi:var.name: PN3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I feel guilty when I waste energy.

ddi:var.name: E2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Climate change is a serious problem for society.

ddi:var.name: BB1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: If more households get solar panels, environmental quality will improve.

ddi:var.name: BB2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Solar panels help slow down climate change.

ddi:var.name: BB3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Having solar panels would be a good way to reduce my environmental impact.

ddi:var.name: BTE8
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Using solar will help protect my family from rising electricity prices in the future.

ddi:var.name: BE13
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Installing solar provides a great return on a family’s investment.

ddi:var.name: BE10
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Using solar would save me money.

ddi:var.name: Co3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Having solar panels on my home would help meet my family’s needs.

ddi:var.name: VB1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Protecting the environment, preserving nature

ddi:var.name: VB2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Respecting the earth, harmony with other species

ddi:var.name: VB3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Unity with nature, fitting into nature

ddi:var.name: VA1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: A world at peace, free of war and conflict

ddi:var.name: VA2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Social justice, correcting injustice, care for the weak

ddi:var.name: VA3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Equality, equal opportunity for all

ddi:var.name: VT1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Honoring parents and elders, showing respect

ddi:var.name: VT2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Family security, safety for loved ones

ddi:var.name: VT3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Self-discipline, self-restraint, resistance to temptation

ddi:var.name: VE1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Authority, the right to lead or command

ddi:var.name: VE2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Influential, having an impact on people and events

ddi:var.name: VE4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Wealth, material possessions, money

ddi:var.name: VO1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: A varied life, filled with challenge, novelty, and change

ddi:var.name: VO2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: An exciting life, stimulating experiences

ddi:var.name: VO3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Curious, interested in everything, exploring

ddi:var.name: RISK_AVERSION_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How much R would pay for a 1 in 5 chance at a $5,000 lottery

ddi:var.name: DISCOUNTING_CLND
ddi:var.ddi:labl: How much R would accept in 1 year to pass up a $5,000 cash payment today

ddi:var.name: CIJM1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Before buying a new brand, I usually ask someone who has experience with the brand for advice.

ddi:var.name: CIJM2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: Before I buy a new product or service, I often ask acquaintances about their experiences with that product or service.

ddi:var.name: CIJM3
ddi:var.ddi:labl: When considering a new product [OR] service, I usually trust the opinions of friends who have used the product [OR] service.

ddi:var.name: CNS1
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I continuously look for new products and brands.

ddi:var.name: CNS2
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I continuously look for new experiences from new products.

ddi:var.name: CNS4
ddi:var.ddi:labl: I like to visit places where I’m exposed to information about new products and brands.
